snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 4 - New Features
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 4 launches on September 25 on Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, and Steam. Pre-order your copy today at valkyria.sega.com

War, while destructive, breeds innovation. Valkyria Chronicles 4 introduces new units, battlefield-defining command orders, and much more. Get a quick look at a few of these features in this trailer!
